Upon completion of this chapter you will be able to:

  • Explain syslog operation.
  • Configure syslog to compile messages on a small- to medium-sized business network management device.
  • Explain SNMP operation.
  • Configure SNMP to compile messages on a small- to medium-sized business network.
  • Describe NetFlow operation.
  • Configure NetFlow to monitor traffic in a small- to medium-sized business network.
  • Explain how NetFlow data is used to examine traffic patterns.
